bibl.title: An Official Act of Cleopatra (with a Subscription in her Own Hand)
bibl.note: P. Bingen 45 (Abusir el-Melek, February 33 BC) is not a private contract. It contains a royal ordinance granting exemption from various taxes to Publius Canidius, Mark Antony's most important general. The word γινέσθωι in line 16 is an original subscription. It must derive from the ruler, in this case Cleopatra herself. Revised text, notes, translation.
bibl.seg: VAN MINNEN Peter, An Official Act of Cleopatra (with a Subscription in her Own Hand).

P. Bingen 45 (Abusir el-Melek, February 33 BC) is not a private contract. It contains a royal ordinance granting exemption from various taxes to Publius Canidius, Mark Antony's most important general. The word γινέσθωι in line 16 is an original subscription. It must derive from the ruler, in this case Cleopatra herself. Revised text, notes, translation.
